sentences.en: A commitment to nationalization was the banner of British socialism.
sentences.cn: 致力于国有化是英国社会主义的旗号。

sentences.en: Additionally, nationalization of banks shouldn't be a goal, but a temporary measure.
sentences.cn: 此外, 对银行实施国有化不应该是目标, 而是一种临时措施.

sentences.en: But nationalization of the land may be no good for China.
sentences.cn: 土地国有化也许不一定对中国有利.

sentences.en: Civilian battalion changes state - owned economy is relative to nationalization character.
sentences.cn: 国有 经济民营化是相对国有化而言的.

sentences.en: Combining with the practice of nationalization of technology and equipments Petrochemical Co.
sentences.cn: 按产品分类表述了工艺的优化设计、工艺装备及生产管理的优化组合方法.

sentences.en: Henry clashed with Tom in the debate on steel nationalization.
sentences.cn: 亨利和汤姆在钢铁国有化方面争论激烈.

sentences.en: Many people nowadays are calling for a nationalization, identification and fossilization.
sentences.cn: 现在有许多人在提倡民族化 、 科学化、大众化.

sentences.en: Many people nowadays are calling for a nationalization, scientification and massilization.
sentences.cn: 现在有许多人在提倡民族化, 科学化,大众化.

sentences.en: Nationalization is a word which is neither very felicitous nor free from ambiguity.
sentences.cn: 国有化是个既不十分贴切,意义也颇含糊的用语.

sentences.en: Parliament will debate the nationalization issue next week.
sentences.cn: 议会将在下周辩论国有化议题。

sentences.en: Seizure of Aboriginal lands under the guise of nationalization.
sentences.cn: 二.以国有化之名掠夺原住民族土地的暴力.

sentences.en: The case for greater nationalization is compelling.
sentences.cn: 主张进一步国有化的理由是令人信服的.

sentences.en: The steel workers were relatively indifferent to the issue of nationalization.
sentences.cn: 相对而言，钢铁工人对国有化的议题并不太关心。

sentences.en: Then, the plan of nationalization rose to surface.
sentences.cn: 于是, 国有化的方案就浮出了水面.

sentences.en: There is also a more radical approach is the nationalization of banks.
sentences.cn: 还有一项更为激进的做法就是银行的国有化.

sentences.en: This paper reviews the production, development and nationalization of the captioned materials.
sentences.cn: 本文就铜系合金引线框架材料的生产 、 发展和国产化进程作一论述.

sentences.en: We don't want to anger the people who don't approve of nationalization.
sentences.cn: 我们不要激怒那些不赞成国有化的人.
